documentation.title: Discouraged Constants
documentation.standard: The use of certain WordPress constants is discouraged. Examples include `TEMPLATEPATH` and `STYLESHEETPATH`.

code.title: Valid: Function used instead of constant.
Invalid: The TEMPLATEPATH constant is used in the code.
